item.title: For people with very rare blood types, obtaining lifesaving blood can be extremely hard. There's a blood type, called Rh-null, which is probably the rarest in the world. By 2010 (since 1961) only 43 people with Rh-null blood had been reported worldwide https://t.co/hy20r7PenA https://t.co/dEIdVK1jKR
